Title: Chimera
Plot: As Mulder investigates a missing person case with a key feature being a menacing raven, he learns to enjoy the creature comforts of a well-tended home while Scully must tough it out on an uncomfortable stakeout.
GuestStars: Wendy Schall, Charles Hoyes, Ashley Edner, Michelle Joyner, Gina Mastrogiacomo, F. William Parker, John Mese
